name: Temple Raider
description:
Wander through the mazes of the ancient temples in search of the lost treasures. Unleash your adventurous spirit and travel to mystic places where no human set foot for thousands of years.

COLLECT ANCIENT RELICS
Explore the ancient tombs to gather the artefacts and solve the mysteries to reach the primal truth.

BEWARE OF FIERCE CREATURES
Uncover the secrets of old civilizations but watch out for traps and ethereal dwellers. Watch your steps and be very cautious of the malevolent curses the ancients may have placed in the tombs.

USE MAPS AND ITEM SEEKERS
If you get stuck at any temple go to the Black market where you can find explosives, item seekers, crayons or even old maps

COMPETE WITH YOUR FRIENDS
Game center achievements to compete with your friends. Unearth more secrets to earn higher adventurous titles.

UNIVERSAL APP
Temple Raider is a universal game that can be installed on your iPhone, iPad and iPod touch. It will always present the best graphics for your device without the need to purchase a new game for iPhone or iPad.

NOTE: Some players fail to see the Vault button next to the collections. It becomes active once you complete any collection set. Vaulting it will reward you with gold coins.
The game can be finished without making a single In-App Purchase.
